text: Stelios Georgousopoulos (born 28 July 1965) is a Greek windsurfer. He competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Sailors at the 1984 Summer Olympics – Windglider Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Division II Category:Olympic sailors of Greece Category:Greek male sailors (sport) Category:Greek windsurfers
title: Stelios Georgousopoulos
